ESRS E1 paragraph AR 73 (a) states: ‘… an estimate of the amount of potentially stranded assets
(in monetary amounts and as a proportion/percentage) from the reporting year until 2030 and
from 2030 to 2050 … may be expressed as a range of asset values based on different climate and
policy scenarios …’.
Answer
